com.viaoa.util

Class IndentFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.Formatter
      • java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter
        • com.viaoa.util.IndentFormatter

  • public class IndentFormatter
extends java.util.logging.SimpleFormatter
    This works with Logger.entering() and Logger.exiting() to create an indentation output. Note: you can use the following instead of entering() or exiting() methods LOG.finest("ENTRY"); // or ">", "START", "BEGIN" LOG.finest("RETURN"); // or "<", "END"
